protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA signal intensity
One set of seedlings was treated with 20ug/ml dexamethasone (dex).The other set of seedlings was treated with 20uM ß-estradiol.
Seedlings were grown on soil in a 10h light 14h dark rhytmn at 23°C after 3 days of stratification.
Extraction of total RNA was performed using InviTrap� Spin Plant RNA Mini Kit (Invitek, Germany) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 100 ng total RNA (GeneChip 3'IVT Kit, Affymetrix 2008). Labeling was performed at KFB Regensburg, Germany.

Following fragmentation, 12.5 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip ATH1 array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400. Hybridisation was performed at KFB Regensburg, Germany.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000. Scaning was performed at KFB Regensburg, Germany.
The data were analyzed with Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console and Expression Console Software. Primary data presented here were analysed at KFB Regensburg, Germany.
